posts.post_content:
I have the following autographed 1909-11 white border T206 cards available for trade. I am looking to trade for:

Unopened Sweet Caporal or Piedmont packs with 1909, 1910 or 1911 tax stamps with a proper Dist/Factory designation for T206s. Preferably encapsulated.

Cards available are:
Doyle (throwing) 
Leifield (batting) - no longer available
Marquard (throwing) - no longer available
Marquard (hands at side)
Livingstone (fielding)
McBride (batting) SGC
McBride (batting) PSA


[IMG]http://www.247hq.com/T206/DOYLE_B57465_B.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.247hq.com/T206/LEIFIELD_B57462_B.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.247hq.com/T206/MARQUARD_B37768_B.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.247hq.com/T206/MARQUARD_B55058_B.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.247hq.com/T206/LIVINGSTON_B36825_B.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.247hq.com/T206/MCBRIDE_B57463_B.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.247hq.com/T206/PSA_MCBRIDE_B.jpg[/IMG]
added the PSA McBride to the others.
The Marquard throwing card is taken.  Others still available for trade.
interested in purchasing the cards at a reasonable price. what are the asking prices?
While id prefer to trade for an unopened t206 pack, certainly PM me if you want to make an offer on any of these.

finding it tough to make an offer, without an asking price. don't really know the going prices are. what do you want for the cards?

kevin
Anything else (t206 related) you were looking to trade for? I have some actual players game used bats if you would be interested. I've always wanted a signed t206 card. If not no big deal!

[quote name="Bpm0014" post=1091809]Anything else (t206 related) you were looking to trade for? I have some actual players game used bats if you would be interested. I've always wanted a signed t206 card. If not no big deal![/QUOTE]

I would be open to a Wagner batting pose.  E90-1, E102, E101, etc
